title: Answering some reviews and giving some advice 😄
text: Without a doubt, this game is fantastic. 😀 I really don’t care 😄about the quick chat and all of that because I got really used to it. I just want to clear things out with fellow crewmates: If a dead 💀body is reported and the reporter says a certain player killed the victim over and over again, BELIEVE THEM. 😓PLEASE 🙏. Not trying to be rude or mean, but the people I play a game with are SO STUPID 🙄. I tell them that a player is an imposter, but they FreAKiNG voted ME out! (Me, out of all players, ME when I witnessed a KILL.) I was so mad🤬, needless to say. This happened multiple times, so I am very annoyed at the crewmates horrible detective skills 😑. Anyways, moving on. My fellow impostors, QUIT trying to get your teammates out! 😠That is just so sad 😞 to the impostors who waited so long to be an impostor. Oh, so crewmates beware: a player who knows who are the impostors with no evidence are very suspicious 🤨 and are most likely an impostor. (If you are a crewmate, please don’t accuse random players of being an impostor.) Okay, time to reply to some reviews. First of all, stop complaining about the quick chat. Get used to it.🫤 It’s really not that hard… Next: yes I know. Among us is not what it used to be a couple years back. Still, this doesn’t change the fact that it’s still the same game, with the exact same format. (Ignore the quick chat 🫥) Again, stop complaining, players. I would just like to ask for a favor from all among us players - if possible, can some people start playing the hide and seek game? Without just choosing SKELD? Mira, Polus, Airship, and Fungle are nearly bare…Now, for a quick talk with the developers. There either are some creepy hackers in among us, or there is a glitch gone wrong. There was lots of times bodies would be left somewhere: when I tried to report them, the button didn’t work. I was quick to call a meeting; guess what. It didn’t work either. I eventually died, so I immediately left the lobby - concerned about getting hacked. Also, there really are no name players with a scary color on them - yellow with a shade of red. I don’t understand how this is possible, but I was really scared of those two players so I left the game (again). Oh, and those players only appeared in the emergency meeting… P.S. Crewmates. Seriously. Stop. Voting. Red. Red is not always impostor, geniuses. (Red’s my fav color, but in some games I can’t use it without risking the votes.🗳️) If you read this message fully, congratulations. You have patience, though you probably are just bored 😑. 🫠Hope to see more hide and seek players! 😀Just wanting to ask, what are your fav among us bean costume?
